channel.title: Clients
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I was the owner of goldenpk back in 2007 not sure if anybody still plays from then, Anyways back then it was all about making servers for silabsoft clients, Now i am back and would like to start a new server but not sure on what the up to date clients are which most people use to base their servers on? Can anybody help me please.

item.title: Clients
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“Goldenboy, post:3, topic:527322”]I know i still can but since i have been gone for 5 years i think i would like to come back with an up to date server using the client people use most these days, if anybody could let me know what this is then that would be great[/quote]hyperion or runesource are both excellent choices

Read full topic
